itunes:title: Mike Musto & Christian James Hand
itunes:author: Matt Farah & Zack Klapman
itunes:summary: Mike Musto (@mike_musto) is an automotive journalist, the host of "Big Muscle" and "House of Muscle", and the head of Hemmings' video production. We talk about his fleet of classic domestic metal, his crazy '68 Charger project, and shitty '80s cars. Christian James Hand hosts the radio show, The Session on Air, where dissects famous songs one instrument at a time. They went to high school together in New York in the 1980s and oh man do they have the stories you want to hear!
itunes:subtitle: Mike Musto (@mike_musto) is an automotive journalist, the host of "Big Muscle" and "House of Muscle", and the head of Hemmings' video production. We talk about his fleet of classic domestic metal, his crazy '68 Charger project, and shitty '80s cars. Christian James Hand hosts the radio show, The Session on Air, where dissects famous songs one instrument at a time.
